roleset.name: wretched, (causing) extreme discomfort

example.name: arg1
example.text: I-1 do n't want [*-1] to be miserable anymore and the longer he is around the more miserable I will be .

example.name: arg0
example.text: If you think the weather is miserable now, wait until August for the blizzards.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.
